movie.title: Coco Before Chanel
movie.plot: Several years after leaving the orphanage, to which her father never returned for her, Gabrielle Chanel finds herself working in a provincial bar. She's both a seamstress for the performers and a singer, earning the nickname Coco from the song she sings nightly with her sister. A liaison with Baron Balsan gives her an entree into French society and a chance to develop her gift for designing.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 19 nominations.
